channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After 5 Years, Apple Finally Upgrades the AirTag
item.description: The second-generation AirTag features Apple's newer Ultra Wideband chip, has a louder speaker, and better range. The second-generation AirTag features...

item.title: SpaceX eyes mid-March for first test of upgraded Starship rocket
item.description: The launch date had been up in the air after the rocket's booster stage suffered an explosion during testing in November.

item.title: Rad Power Bikes reaches deal to sell itself for $13.2M
item.description: A company called Life Electric Vehicle Holdings has emerged as the top bidder for Rad Power's assets. It's not clear what the company plans to do with...

item.title: Social network UpScrolled sees surge in downloads following TikTok’s US takeover
item.description: UpScrolled is a social network that pledges to remain impartial to political agendas. It blends familiar features from Instagram and X, letting users ...

item.title: TikTok alternative Skylight soars to 380K+ users after TikTok US deal finalized
item.description: Skylight, co-founded by CEO Tori White and CTO Reed Harmeyer, offers a built-in video editor; user profiles; support for likes, commenting, and sharin...

item.title: Here’s the tech powering ICE’s deportation crackdown
item.description: From phone spyware and facial recognition to phone unlocking technology and databases and more, this tech powers Trump's deportation machine.

item.title: Only 5 days left: Over half of the first 500 TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 +1 passes at 50% off are already gone
item.description: Register now to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass and get a +1 ticket at 50% off. Offer ends this Friday, January 30.

item.title: Microsoft announces powerful new chip for AI inference
item.description: Microsoft has announced the launch of its latest chip, the Maia 200, which the company describes as a silicon workhorse designed for scaling AI infere...

item.title: Nvidia invests $2B to help debt-ridden CoreWeave add 5GW of AI compute
item.description: CoreWeave will also integrate Nvidia's products across its platform, including the new Rubin chip architecture.

item.title: AI startup CVector raises $5M for its industrial ‘nervous system’
item.description: Now, founders Richard Zhang and Tyler Ruggles are tasked with a bigger challenge: showing customers and investors how this AI-powered software layer t...
